Original: Hail, explorers. Take a seat and have
a drink, why don't you?
[Page]
An explorer's curiosity certainly is
insatiable... If they have an errand,
they'll even head out at night.
[Page]
Since you seem to just be starting
out, let me give you fair warning.
Be careful when exploring at night.
[Page]
You're likely to run into terrifying
beasts you don't see during the day.
It takes some getting used to.
Translation: Hail, explorers. Take a seat and have
a drink, why don't you?

Original: Hail, explorers. Take a seat and have
a drink, why don't you?
[Page]
When you're up against a [Enemy1:15],
you can't be the ones to attack first.
That only makes it angrier.
[Page]
It's the same when going up against
rival guilds. Throw the first punch,
and you're liable to get arrested...
